      • isMoving

        public boolean isMoving(byte direction)
        Returns whether or not the player is currently moving in a certain direction
        Parameters:
        direction - UP, DOWN, LEFT or RIGHT
        Returns:
        True if the player is moving in the given direction, false if not or the given direction was unknown
